description: External Attacker generates a Physical threat causing a Discharge of pollutants of the Sensors of the ALERT SYSTEM which affects Raw water bodies and might lead to a Quality issue
example: An attacker discharge pollutants near a sensor tricking the measurement into issuing a warning; leading to quality issues of the bathing water.

description: External Attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Denial of Service of the Sensors of the ALERT SYSTEM which affects Raw water bodies and might lead to a Quality issue
example: An attacker who knows where are the different sensors put small jammers close to them, preventing them to connect.

description: External Attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Denial of Service of the Sensors of the ALERT SYSTEM which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Quality issue
example: An attacker who knows where are the different sensors put small jammers close to them, preventing them to connect.

description: External Attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Manipulation of the data of the Sensors of the ALERT SYSTEM which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Quality issue
example: An attacker steal a sensor in order to access the firmware on it an possibly get access to the server (he might want to send fake data).

description: External Attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Manipulation of the data of the Sensors of the ALERT SYSTEM which affects Raw water bodies and might lead to a Quality issue
example: An attacker steal a sensor in order to access the firmware on it an possibly get access to the server (he might want to send fake data).

description: External Attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Manipulation of the data of the Sensors of the ALERT SYSTEM which affects Raw water bodies and might lead to a Information leak issue
example: An attacker steal a sensor in order to access the firmware on it an possibly get access to the server (he might want to send fake data).

description: External Attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Manipulation of the data of the Sensors of the ALERT SYSTEM which affects Raw water bodies and might lead to a False information issue
example: An attacker steal a sensor in order to access the firmware on it an possibly get access to the server (he might want to send fake data).

description: External Attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Manipulation of the data of the Server of the ALERT SYSTEM which affects Raw water bodies and might lead to a Information leak issue
example: An attacker hacks into the platform controlling the ALERT system and gets access to the database

description: External Attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Manipulation of the data of the Server of the ALERT SYSTEM which affects Raw water bodies and might lead to a False information issue
example: An attacker hacks into the platform controlling the ALERT system and changes the data

description: External Attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Denial of Service of the Server of the ALERT SYSTEM which affects Raw water bodies and might lead to a Quality issue
example: An attacker hacks into the platform controlling the ALERT system and prevent it from sampling.

description: Human fault generates a cyber threat causing a Denial of service of the Server of the DS 12 Decision support system which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Reputation issue
example: System changes in the internal network setup causes several  servers and therefore the decission support system to be offline and unavailable.

description: Internal attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Denial of service of the Server of the DS 12 Decision support system which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Reputation issue
example: An internal attacker has the opertunity to place a hardware device on the internal network causing a DDoS attack on several internal servers  witch affects the availability of the Decission support system.

description: External supplier generates a cyber threat causing a Denial of service of the Server of the DS 12 Decision support system which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Reputation issue
example: An extranal supplier has lost a tender and one of the external employees places a script/program on a server that causes the Decision support system to be unavailable.

description: Internal attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Spoofing of the Web application of the DS 13 Interface  which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Quantity issue
example: An internal attacker with server access manipulates the data feed from the Decision support system to the Web application causing the Web application to show wrong / fake data to end users

description: External supplier generates a cyber threat causing a Spoofing of the Web application of the DS 13 Interface  which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Quality issue
example: An employee at a extranal supplier is fired, but before the employee access to the it systems he manages is closed the employee changes the access to the server by adding a new user with administrative server rights.

description: External attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Denial of Service of the Web application of the DS 13 Interface  which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Reputation issue
example: An attacker dos the platform, making it unavailable to end users, or to the public and leading to a reputation issue.

description: Human fault generates a physical threat causing a Destruction of the Sensors of the DS11 Flow forecast which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Not serious issue
example: A flow sensor is accidentially broken and no data is received. The control software is made with fall-back in case of sensor failure.  Sensor failure or no data or data flatline will trigger en alarm to a operator

description: Internal attacker generates a physical threat causing a Destruction of the Sensors of the DS11 Flow forecast which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Not serious issue
example: A flow sensor is deliberately broken and no data is received. The control software is made with fall-back in case of sensor failure. Sensor failure or no data or data flatline will trigger en alarm to a operator

description: External attacker generates a physical threat causing a Destruction of the Sensors of the DS11 Flow forecast which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Not serious issue
example: An external attacker breaks into one of the buildings where several sensors is placed, during the burglary the external attacker breaks one or several sensors. The control software is made with fall-back in case of sensor failure.  Sensor failure or no data or data flatline will trigger en alarm to a operator

description: Internal attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Manipulation of the data of the Server of the DS11 Flow forecast which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Quantity issue
example: (An angry) BIOFOS employee is deliberately manipulating data to obtain bad treatment

description: Internal attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Manipulation of the data of the Server of the DS11 Flow forecast which affects Sewers or Wastewater treatment plant and might lead to a Quality issue
example: (An angry) BIOFOS employee is deliberately manipulating data to obtain bad treatment

example: An external supplier perhaps loosing a new tender, is deliberately manipulating data to obtain bad treatment

example: An external supplier perhaps loosing a new tender, is deliberately manipulating data to obtain bad treatment

composite_asset:
Early Warning System 
for safe water reuse
description:
External Attacker generates a cyber threat causing a Denial of Service of the Sensors of the Early Warning System 
for safe water reuse which affects Irrigation water and might lead to a Quality issue
example: An attacker might manipulate the Early Warning system's data, therefore generating warnings not related to the actual water quality. The latter would lead to water reuse quality issues and/or wastewater tratment plant reputation impacts.
